      • constructRandomGraph

        public static HyperGraph constructRandomGraph(int numNodes,
                                              int numEdges,
                                              int numNodeLabels,
                                              int numEdgeLabels)
        Create a random HyperGraph for a set of node label and a set edge labels.
        Parameters:
        numNodes - number of nodes for the graph.
        numEdges - number of edges for the graph.
        numNodeLabels - number of possible different node labels for the graph.
        numEdgeLabels - number of possible different node labels for the graph.
        Returns:
        a random constructed HyperGraph.

        Create a set of node labels.
        Parameters:
        numNodeLabels - number of how many node labels are generated.
        Returns:
        the set of node labels.

        Add a set of nodes to the graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph for which the method will be executed.
        numNodes - number of how many nodes are generated.
        numNodeLabels - number of how many possible different node labels are generated.

        private static void compressRandomGraph(int numNodes,
                                        int numEdges,
                                        int numNodeLabels,
                                        int numEdgeLabels)
        Compress a random Graph.
        Parameters:
        numNodes - the number of nodes from the graph.
        numEdges - the number of edges from the graph.
        numNodeLabels - the number of different node labels from the graph.
        numEdgeLabels - the number of different edge labels from the graph.
